alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 1:10AM PST until January 14 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches above 7,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph on exposed ridgetops and along the crest. * WHERE...Yosemite National Park outside of the valley and Upper San Joaquin River. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to nearly impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you plan to travel, consider alternate strategies. If you must travel, remember to carry tire chains, plenty of food, a good deal of water, warm clothing, and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley
